title: Real Estate Dashboard
description: End-to-end data engineering pipeline to develop a dashboard which showcases transcation data of price paid for various properties in England and Wales from 1995 till date.

title: Data Pipeline with Apache Airflow
description: Developed and implemented a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) using Apache Airflow to orchestrate the end-to-end process of downloading, cleaning, transforming, and uploading data into Google Cloud Storage and a BigQuery table.

title: Data Ingestion Pipeline with Docker
description: Developed a data ingestion pipline with Docker to extract data from a CSV file, transform with Python and load into a PostgreSQL database.

title: Financial Market Analyzer
description: A Python-based application designed to retrieve, analyze, and visualize financial market data.

title: Enhancing Real Estate Valuation with Textual Data
description: Improved valuation accuracy of property valuation models in London and Brighton by integrating textual analysis with traditional valuation metrics.

title: Exploration of SBA/CDC 504 Loan Data
description: Investigated the trends, patterns, and insights within 504 loan data spanning over a decade, aiming to understand the dynamics of loan allocations and their impact on small businesses.

title: Initial Coin Offering (ICO) Prediction
description: Developed machine learning models using R to predict the succes or failure of ICO's

title: Fetal Health Classifier
description: Developed machine learning classifier capable of identifying the health status of a fetal based on various criteria.
